articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Pompeo heads to N Korea ahead of summit
articles.description: The US Secretary of State travels to Pyongyang ahead of a meeting between Kim Jong-un and Donald Trump.

articles.author: https://www.nytimes.com/by/shane-goldmacher, http://www.nytimes.com/by/alan-feuer
articles.title: Eric Schneiderman Set Himself Up as Trump’s Foil. What Happens Now?
articles.description: The attorney general had made his name since 2016 a crusader against Mr. Trump’s agenda and a counterweight to the presidential pardon powers.

articles.author: Eli Watkins, CNN
articles.title: Obama: Leaving Iran deal 'misguided'
articles.description: Former President Barack Obama on Tuesday criticized President Donald Trump's decision to exit the Iran deal, a pillar of Obama's legacy on foreign policy.

articles.title: Read the Full Transcript of Trump’s Iran Nuclear Deal Speech
articles.description: President Trump addressed the nation from the White House on Tuesday to announce the decision, which will isolate the United States from its European allies.

articles.title: Netanyahu: Israel thanks Trump for his courage - CNN Video
articles.description: Israel's Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu says Israel fully supports President Trump's decision to withdraw from the Iran nuclear deal.

articles.title: Trump's entire Iran deal announcement - CNN Video
articles.description: President Donald Trump announces his decision to pull the United States out of the Iran nuclear deal.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Three reasons behind Trump ditching Iran deal
articles.description: Donald Trump announced the US will withdraw from the Iran nuclear agreement. Here are some reasons behind his decision.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Israel Golan alert over Iran 'activity'
articles.description: The military tells residents to prepare bomb shelters over "irregular Iranian activity" in Syria.

articles.author: http://www.nytimes.com/by/charlie-savage
articles.title: 9/11 Planner, Tortured by C.I.A., Asks to Tell Senators About Gina Haspel
articles.description: It isn’t known whether Ms. Haspel, nominated to lead the C.I.A., was involved in torturing Khalid Shaikh Mohammed, who asked a military judge at Guantánamo Bay for permission to share the information.

articles.author: Jonathan Cheng
articles.title: Pompeo Heads to North Korea as Trump-Kim Summit Approaches
articles.description: Secretary of State Mike Pompeo is headed to North Korea on his second trip in just over a month, President Donald Trump said Tuesday, as a planned summit between Mr. Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un approaches.

articles.author: Kevin Liptak, CNN
articles.title: Trump announces withdrawal from Iran nuclear deal, will re-institute sanctions
articles.description: President Donald Trump announced Tuesday he is quitting the Iran nuclear deal, pitting him against the United States' closest allies and leaving the future of Tehran's nuclear ambitions in question.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Trump pulls US out of Iran deal
articles.description: "A decaying and rotten deal" - Trump says he will withdraw the US from Obama-era nuclear agreement with Iran

articles.author: Laurence Norman
articles.title: How Fast Iran Could Build a Nuclear Bomb
articles.description: Iran could quickly ramp up its nuclear activities if President Donald Trump pulls out of the agreement designed to curtail them, but experts and former officials differ over how long Tehran would need to build a bomb.

articles.author: http://www.nytimes.com/by/david-e-sanger
articles.title: Behind Trump’s Termination of Iran Deal is Risky Bet that U.S. Can ‘Break the Regime’
articles.description: President Trump’s decision to pull out of the Iran nuclear deal is premised on the idea that the U.S. and its allies force a better deal with Tehran through isolation and sanctions.

articles.author: Ryan Dube
articles.title: Argentina Seeks Credit Line From IMF
articles.description: Argentina’s government has begun talks with the International Monetary Fund for a credit line as the administration of President Mauricio Macri seeks to contain a steady depreciation of the local currency.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Ebola returns to DR Congo
articles.description: There are two confirmed cases and 17 deaths where the virus is suspected in Bikoro, officials say.

articles.author: Michael R. Gordon
articles.title: Trump to Withdraw U.S. From Iran Accord
articles.description: President Donald Trump was set on Tuesday to announce that the U.S. is withdrawing from the Iran nuclear accord, according to a person briefed on the decision.

articles.author: Stu Woo
articles.title: Vodafone to Buy Some of Liberty Global’s European Assets for $23 Billion
articles.description: Vodafone, the world’s second-largest wireless carrier by subscribers, is close to announcing a $23 billion cash deal to buy operations in four European countries from John Malone’s Liberty Global.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: World awaits Trump verdict on Iran deal
articles.description: America's European allies hold their breath to see if the US president will torpedo the accord.

articles.author: Mark Landler
articles.title: Trump Tells Macron the U.S. Will Withdraw From Iran Nuclear Deal
articles.description: Mr. Trump’s decision, while long anticipated and widely telegraphed, plunges America’s relations with European allies into deep uncertainty.
